*May 29, 2024*

### Expected Contract End Date
*September 30, 2024*

## Overview
Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to bid on a rock slope remediation project along Highway 93S in Kootenay National Park. The scope of work includes rock scaling, rock bolting, and ditch excavation. The project is scheduled to commence on August 16, 2024, and be completed by September 30, 2024.

## Two-Stage Selection Process
This posting marks the second stage of a two-stage solicitation process. The first stage evaluated the qualifications of interested suppliers, and the second stage invites qualified suppliers to provide further qualifications and a financial bid based on the project specifications and drawings.

## Requirements and Specifications
The successful contractor will be responsible for completing the following tasks:

* Rock scaling
* Rock bolting
* Ditch excavation
